verbose_text: Co-overexpression of pri-let-7a-1 mutants with Lin28a in HeLa cells followed by northern blotting against let-7a confirmed the importance of the AU dinucleotide adjacent to the GGAG motif in the Lin28a mediated inhibition of let-7a processing, as only the pri-let-7a-1@2 mutant was suppressed to the same extent as the wild-type pri-let-7a-1 (XREF_FIG).
